about_the_game:
"Traditional Chinese Tilesets" recreates various scenes of traditional Chinese culture and is a suitable material for creating Chinese styled games or Chinese martial arts games!
This pack enables you to create stunning Chinese landscapes, including tranquil locations, affluent and humble households, busy street scenes, and various other forms of traditional Chinese cultural settings.

■ Delicate depiction of Chinese culture.
The pack offers a delicate portrayal of Chinese culture, showcasing exquisite depictions of historical and cultural relics.

■ Contains many scenes of various stages of life, enabling creators to depict a more realistic and richer game environment.

■This pack is ideal for those who wish to recreate classic Chinese martial arts games with the RPG Maker series, providing the perfect resources to create a detailed game with a Chinese theme.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【tilesets (6 sheets)】

・A1 tiles：1 sheets
・A5 tiles：1 sheets
・B~E tiles：4 sheets


【character (1 sheets)】

・Dragon and lion dance walking 144*144 pixel (1 pattern)
detailed_description:
"Traditional Chinese Tilesets" recreates various scenes of traditional Chinese culture and is a suitable material for creating Chinese styled games or Chinese martial arts games!
This pack enables you to create stunning Chinese landscapes, including tranquil locations, affluent and humble households, busy street scenes, and various other forms of traditional Chinese cultural settings.

■ Delicate depiction of Chinese culture.
The pack offers a delicate portrayal of Chinese culture, showcasing exquisite depictions of historical and cultural relics.

■ Contains many scenes of various stages of life, enabling creators to depict a more realistic and richer game environment.

■This pack is ideal for those who wish to recreate classic Chinese martial arts games with the RPG Maker series, providing the perfect resources to create a detailed game with a Chinese theme.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【tilesets (6 sheets)】

・A1 tiles：1 sheets
・A5 tiles：1 sheets
・B~E tiles：4 sheets


【character (1 sheets)】

・Dragon and lion dance walking 144*144 pixel (1 pattern)
